official_title: To amend the National Housing Act to reform and simplify the single family home mortgage insurance program of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.

summary.text: FHA Reform Act of 1994 - Amends the National Housing Act to: (1) revise single family housing insurance mortgage limitations; and (2) authorize a single family risk-sharing mortgage insurance program with State and local agencies.

titles.title: To amend the National Housing Act to reform and simplify the single family home mortgage insurance program of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.
